ygData.subject: Re: Kill the Trainers
ygData.msgSnippet: Ignatius already transformed and tried escaping but I think I can make this post work. Ignatius dodged missle after missle from the Destrocons. finally one

Ignatius already transformed and tried escaping but I think I can make this
post work.

Ignatius dodged missle after missle from the Destrocons. finally one hit,
then another, then a third. It was obvious from all the singed feathers that
he wasn't going to out run these bots. Quickly he turned and dove downward
towards Drillbit. The only way he could think to avoid the artillery was to
get close enough to one of them that they wouldn't risk harming thier ally.
He sweapt low, his talons just missing the first attempt. Drillbit swung his
drill at Ignatius like King Kong going after a plane. The swing missed but
Ignatius' problem was still there. more missles slammed into him followed by
weapons fire from Kali and company. Ignatius' wings were badly damaged but
with alot of effort he could still fly. The enraged Eagle sweapt again at
Drillbit trying to grab him in his talons. The Trainers only hope was to
grab and go.


----- Original Message -----
From: RoboRick007 <rfa007@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Sunday, June 24, 2001 7:13 AM
Subject: Re: Kill the Trainers


> ::DrillBit::
>
> He jumped up as the missile hit below him. The shockwave from the
> explosion sent him over the dune and to where Ignatius was. As he came
> down he switched his gattaling gun to drill mode. He landed less then a
> foot from Ignatius, and out stretched his arm, with force. He was going
> to drill a hole right through Ignatius. The Trainer eagle bot would die.
>
>
